alert.note: Alert for Central and Southeast Phillips; Central and Southern Valley; Daniels; Dawson; Eastern Roosevelt; Garfield; McCone; Northern Phillips; Northern Valley; Prairie; Richland; Western Roosevelt (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 25 at 9:23PM MDT by NWS Glasgow
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southeastern Phillips, Garfield, southwestern Daniels, western Roosevelt, Valley, McCone, northwestern Prairie, northwestern Dawson and northwestern Richland Counties through 1030 PM MDT... At 923 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 12 miles southeast of Whitewater to near Cohagen. Movement was northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Glasgow, Wolf Point, Malta, Poplar, Circle, Jordan, Richland, Nashua, Fort Peck, Saco, Richey, Duck Creek Rec Area, Hillside, Hell Creek Rec Area, Flowing Wells Rest Area, Peerless, Hinsdale, Lustre, Lambert and Vida. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
